trans-unit.source: Causes the Network Server to listen on a specific network interface.

seg-source.mrk: Causes the Network Server to listen on a specific network interface.

target.mrk: Causes the Network Server to listen on a specific network interface.

trans-unit.source: This property allows multiple instances of Network Server to run on a single machine, each using its own unique host:port combination. The host needs to be set to enable remote connections.

seg-source.mrk: This property allows multiple instances of Network Server to run on a single machine, each using its own unique host:port combination.
The host needs to be set to enable remote connections.

target.mrk: This property allows multiple instances of Network Server to run on a single machine, each using its own unique host:port combination.
The host needs to be set to enable remote connections.

trans-unit.source: By default, the Network Server will listen only on the loopback address. If the property is set to <codeph>0.0.0.0</codeph>, the Network Server will listen on all interfaces.

seg-source.mrk: By default, the Network Server will listen only on the loopback address.
If the property is set to <codeph>0.0.0.0</codeph>, the Network Server will listen on all interfaces.

target.mrk: By default, the Network Server will listen only on the loopback address.
If the property is set to <codeph>0.0.0.0</codeph>, the Network Server will listen on all interfaces.

trans-unit.source: Ensure that you are running under a security manager and that user authorization is enabled before you enable remote connections with this property.

seg-source.mrk: Ensure that you are running under a security manager and that user authorization is enabled before you enable remote connections with this property.

target.mrk: Ensure that you are running under a security manager and that user authorization is enabled before you enable remote connections with this property.

trans-unit.source: If no host name is specified, the Network Server listens on the loopback address of the current machine (localhost).

seg-source.mrk: If no host name is specified, the Network Server listens on the loopback address of the current machine (localhost).

target.mrk: If no host name is specified, the Network Server listens on the loopback address of the current machine (localhost).

trans-unit.source: Static. You must restart the Network Server for changes to take effect.

seg-source.mrk: You must restart the Network Server for changes to take effect.

target.mrk: You must restart the Network Server for changes to take effect.
